text: Beginnings is a 1969 rock album by English band Slade, under their earlier name Ambrose Slade. It was the band's first studio album, which failed to chart. In America, the album was titled Ballzy and featured new artwork. The album featured the instrumental single "Genesis". ==Track listing== == Other websites == * Beginnings at Discogs Category:1969 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Slade albums Category:Rock albums
title: Beginnings (Ambrose Slade album)
